cause.description:
PLEASE! WE NEED YOUR HELP TO BRING TAHLIA HAMILTON BACK TO PERU! WE NEED HER! SHE IS PERUVIAN, NOT LONGER SOUTH AFRICAN TAHLIA! COME BACK!!!
1. Our life without Tahlia is useless
2. We need someone to laugh with at lunch!
cause.mission: bring Tahlia Hamilton back from South Africa
cause.name: Help us bring Tahlia Hamilton back!
